Request.RequestTemplate: <DataSet Name="AccountSync.UpdatePersonalAccounts"> <Attributes> <Attribute Name="Protocol" Type="System.String" Value="Wcf"/> <Attribute Name="Procedure" Type="System.String" Value="AccountSync.UpdatePersonalAccounts"/> <Attribute Name="RequestId" Type="System.String" Value="##org.id##"/> <Attribute Name="PersonalAccountNumber" Type="System.String" Value="##PersonalAccount##"/> <Attribute Name="TaxGroupId" Type="System.String" Value="##TAX_GROUP_ID##"/> <Attribute Name="ServiceProviderCode" Type="System.String" Value="##SERVICE_PROVIDER_CODE##"/> <Attribute Name="PspDayOfMonth" Type="System.String" Value="##PSP_DAY_OF_MONTH_VALUE##"/> <Attribute Name="ContractNumber" Type="System.String" Value="##CONTRACT_NUMBER##"/> <Attribute Name="CustomerTypeId" Type="System.String" Value="##CUSTOMER_TYPE_ID##"/> <Attribute Name="CalculationMethodId" Type="System.String" Value="##CALCULATION_METHOD_ID##"/> </Attributes> </DataSet>
